item.title: 美国银行首席执行官欢迎特朗普的经济政策，认为这对企业是 "好事
item.description: 美国银行首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）周二对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普就职以来宣布的经济政策表示欢迎，认为这对企业来说是件 "好事"。【原文：Bank of America Chief Executive Brian Moynihan on Tuesday welcomed economic policies announced by U.S. President Donald Trump since his inauguration as a "good thing" for business.】

item.title: 葡萄牙 TAP 航空公司 2024 年客运量增长，美洲领衔增长
item.description: 葡萄牙 TAP 航空公司周二表示，该公司计划进行私有化，去年在北美和巴西航线的带动下运送了 1610 万乘客，比 2023 年增长了 1.6%。【原文：Portugal's airline TAP, which is slated for privatisation, carried 16.1 million passengers last year, a 1.6% rise from 2023, led by North American and Brazilian routes, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Coinbase 首席执行官在达沃斯表示，特朗普对加密货币的影响不可否认，将吸引投资
item.description: Coinbase 首席执行官在达沃斯世界经济论坛的一次小组讨论会上表示，唐纳德-特朗普连任美国总统后，将吸引大量投资进入加密货币领域。【原文：Donald Trump's second term as U.S. president will draw a lot of investment into crypto, the CEO of Coinbase told a panel discussion at the World Economic Forum in Davos.】

item.title: D.R. Horton 第一季度业绩超出预期，原因是低住房供应量促进了新房需求
item.description: 本周二，D.R. Horton 公司第一季度营收和利润均超出华尔街预期，原因是尽管抵押贷款利率上升，但美国住房市场上现房持续短缺，这有助于促进新房销售。【原文：D.R. Horton beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday as a persistent shortage of existing homes in the U.S. housing market helped boost new home sales despite higher mortgage rates.】

item.title: 2024 年中国非金融类对外直接投资同比增长 10.5
item.description: 中国商务部周二表示，按美元计算，2024 年中国非金融类对外直接投资同比增长 10.5%，达到 1,439 亿美元。【原文：China's non-financial outbound direct investment rose 10.5% year-on-year in dollar terms in 2024 to $143.9 billion, the country's commerce ministry said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普重返白宫：市场赢家和输家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫后，全球市场既感到欣慰，也感到失望，因为投资者正试图了解未来四年会带来什么。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's return to the White House has been met with both relief and disappointment across world markets as investors try to work out what the next four years will bring.】

item.title: 瑞银首席执行官称考虑收购为时尚早
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）周二表示，该瑞士银行目前考虑收购的时机尚不成熟，因为它仍在专注于整合其于 2023 年收购的瑞士信贷。【原文：UBS Chief Executive Sergio Ermotti on Tuesday said it was currently premature for the Swiss bank to consider acquisitions as it continues to focus on the integration of Credit Suisse, which it bought in 2023.】

item.title: Birkenstock 首席财务官 Erik Massmann 将卸任
item.description: 德国鞋商 Birkenstock 周二表示，其首席财务官 Erik Massmann 将在任职近两年后卸任，由 Ivica Krolo 接替。【原文：German shoemaker Birkenstock said on Tuesday its Chief Financial Officer Erik Massmann will step down after nearly two years in the role, and will be succeeded by Ivica Krolo.】

item.title: 德国汽车制造商称特朗普关税将损害美国消费者和汽车产业
item.description: 德国强大的汽车行业周二警告说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划将意味着美国消费者的汽车价格上涨，并打击全球汽车制造商，汽车股也因美国提高进口关税的前景而下跌。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff plans would mean higher car prices for U.S. consumers and hit global automakers, Germany's powerful car industry warned on Tuesday, as auto stocks fell on the prospect of higher U.S. import duties.】

item.title: 美敦力任命雷诺高管 Thierry Piéton 为财务总监
item.description: 美敦力公司周二表示，将任命雷诺公司财务总监 Thierry Piéton 为公司首席财务官，3 月 3 日起生效。【原文：Medtronic said on Tuesday it will appoint Renault's finance chief Thierry Piéton as its chief financial officer, effective March 3.】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司美国首次公开募股目标估值高达 107 亿美元
item.description: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）周二表示，其美国首次公开募股的目标估值将高达 107.3 亿美元。【原文：Smithfield Foods is targeting a valuation of up to $10.73 billion in its U.S. initial public offering, the Farmland bacon maker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 渣打银行任命 Sal Vitale 为美国业务负责人
item.description: 渣打银行周二表示，该行已任命 Sal Vitale 为董事总经理兼美国和美洲业务负责人。【原文：Standard Chartered has named Sal Vitale as managing director and head of coverage for the U.S. and the Americas, the bank said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 需求强劲，3M 第四季度利润高于预期
item.description: 受工业粘合剂、胶带和电子产品销售增长的推动，美国工业集团 3M 公司周二公布的第四季度调整后利润高于预期。【原文：U.S. industrial conglomerate 3M Co on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter adjusted profit above estimates, driven by higher sales of industrial adhesives, tapes and electronics.】

item.title: 交易员为特朗普 2.0 上马
item.description: 在一天中加元交易最冷清的时候，这条头条新闻出现在了屏幕上：美国总统唐纳德-特朗普考虑在一周内对加拿大商品征收 25% 的关税。【原文：The headline hit screens at the quietest time of day for trading Canadian dollars: U.S. President Donald Trump was thinking about imposing a 25% tariff on Canadian goods in just over a week's time.】

item.title: 投资者为特朗普总统的贸易政策计划做好准备，期货价格攀升
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走强，投资者对新当选的唐纳德-特朗普总统在能源和移民等问题上的行政命令进行了评估，同时等待他在贸易政策上的首次行动。【原文：U.S. stock index futures firmed on Tuesday, as investors assessed newly elected President Donald Trump's executive orders on issues including energy and immigration, while awaiting his first move on trade policy.】

item.title: 特朗普如何阻止联邦雇员远程工作？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统周一签署了一项行政命令，要求大多数联邦雇员本人全职返回工作岗位，此举很可能会引发工会的反弹和法律挑战。【原文：President Donald Trump on Monday signed an executive order requiring most federal employees to return to work in person full time, a move that is likely to spark backlash and legal challenges from unions.】

item.title: 解说：特朗普能否推翻拜登的海上钻井禁令？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一发布行政命令，撤销了民主党前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）对美国大部分海岸线新的近海石油和天然气开发实施的禁令。特朗普这样做的权力肯定会面临法律挑战。【原文：President Donald Trump in an executive order on Monday revoked a ban imposed by former Democratic President Joe Biden on new offshore oil and gas development along most of the country's coastlines. Trump is certain to face legal challenges over his authority to do so.】

item.title: 早间竞价："止步不前 "的特朗普关税交易鞭打美元
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 经过两年的一帆风顺，美联储已准备好驾驭动荡的债券市场和特朗普的不确定性
item.description: 经过两年在通胀和令人惊讶的持续经济增长方面取得的进展，美联储下周的会议一方面要关注特朗普政府的新政策，另一方面要关注债券市场，即使在美国央行行长们一直在降息的情况下，债券市场的借贷成本也在不断攀升。【原文：After two years of progress on inflation and surprisingly persistent economic growth, the Federal Reserve next week meets with one eye on new Trump administration policies and another on a bond market that has ratcheted up borrowing costs even as U.S. central bankers have been cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 空中客车公司首席执行官告诉员工，2024 年年底的状况比预期的要好
item.description: 欧洲空中客车公司（Airbus）首席执行官告诉员工，该集团在2024年底的状况比去年夏天发布利润预警时所担心的要好，但同时警告说，国际环境正在恶化，新增加的业务风险也在增加。【原文：The CEO of Europe's Airbus has told staff that the group ended 2024 in better shape than it feared when issuing a profit warning last summer, while warning of a deteriorating international environment and newly increased business risks.】

item.title: 万科困境考验中国房地产业复兴努力的极限
item.description: 近年来，中国政府采取了许多措施来解决房地产市场的流动性危机，预计最终将重拾旧业，直接出手稳定一家被视为房地产行业风向标的国有开发商。【原文：After numerous measures to resolve a liquidity crisis in the property market in recent years, Beijing is expected to end up dusting off an old playbook and step in directly to stabilise a state-backed developer seen as a bellwether for the sector.】

item.title: 斯坦兰蒂斯称已做好准备适应特朗普的政策变化
item.description: 在美国新总统威胁要对从墨西哥和加拿大进口的商品征收 25% 的关税后，斯泰兰特汽车制造商周二表示，公司已做好充分准备，以适应唐纳德-特朗普宣布的政策变化。【原文：Stellantis is well positioned to adapt to policy changes announced by Donald Trump, the automaker said on Tuesday after the new U.S. president threatened tariffs of 25% on imports from Mexico and Canada.】

item.title: 欧盟冯德莱恩在达沃斯就关税问题发出 "全球竞相抄底 "的警告
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周二警告说，利用制裁、出口管制和关税等经济手段进行 "全球竞相逐低 "的风险很大。【原文：European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen warned on Tuesday of the risk of a 'global race to the bottom' using economic tools such as sanctions, export controls and tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普将矛头指向美国海上风电，欧洲企业暴露无遗
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在周一上任的第一天就暂停了新的联邦海上风电租赁项目，以等待环境和经济审查，并称风力发电厂丑陋、昂贵且对野生动物有害。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump in his first day of office on Monday suspended new federal offshore wind leasing pending an environmental and economic review, saying wind mills are ugly, expensive and harm wildlife.】

item.title: 报告称中国奢侈品市场进入 "新常态"，预计 2025 年销量将持平
item.description: 贝恩咨询公司（Bain and Company）在本周二发布的最新《中国奢侈品报告》中表示，中国奢侈品市场将在 2024 年下降 18%至 20%，标志着 "指数增长 "时期的结束，预计今年的销售额将保持持平。【原文：China's luxury market declined by 18% to 20% in 2024, marking the end of a period of "exponential growth", with sales expected to remain flat this year, consultancy Bain and Company said at the launch of its latest 'China Luxury Report' on Tuesday.】

item.title: 关税担忧缓解巩固对欧洲央行下周降息的押注
item.description: 美国新政府没有实施一些人担心的全面贸易关税，欧洲中央银行的决策者们可能松了一口气，下周降息似乎已成定局。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers are likely breathing a sigh of relief that the new U.S. administration did not impose the blanket trade tariffs some had feared and a rate cut next week now seems like a done deal.】

item.title: 文件称三星和 LG 可能将部分家电制造从墨西哥转移到美国
item.description: 据韩国一家报纸周二报道，韩国三星电子和 LG 电子正在考虑将部分家电产品的生产从墨西哥工厂转移到美国工厂。【原文：South Korea's Samsung Electronics and LG Electronics are considering moving some manufacturing of home appliances from their Mexican plants to their U.S. plants, a South Korean newspaper reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国银行称，投资者通过大量股票配置 "让欧洲再次伟大
item.description: 美国博雅全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）周二公布的一份投资者调查报告显示，由于落后的风险资产奋起直追，欧洲股市在 1 月份的配置比例达到四分之一世纪以来的第二高。【原文：European stocks saw their second largest allocation in a quarter of a century in January, as lagging risk assets played catch up, according to a survey of investors from BofA Global Research published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：阿美石油公司总裁在达沃斯会议上表示，他预计今年石油需求将增加 130 万桶/日
item.description: 沙特石油巨头阿美石油公司（Aramco）首席执行官阿明-纳赛尔（Amin Nasser）周二表示，他认为石油市场是健康的，并预计今年石油日产量将增加 130 万桶。【原文：Saudi oil giant Aramco's Chief Executive Amin Nasser said on Tuesday he sees the oil market as healthy and expects an additional 1.3 million barrels per day this year.】

item.title: 比特币、美元下滑，等待加密货币总统特朗普的承诺
item.description: 特朗普的第一套政策没有提及资产类别。【原文：Trump's first set of policies made no reference to the asset class.】
